sectionSubtitle: Proof of Humanity enables verified human identities, enhancing security, fairness, and trust across applications.

cards.title: Self-Sovereign Identities
cards.description: PoH accounts enable seamless logins for dApps, recognizing verified users without extra registration.

cards.title: Online Voting & Governance
cards.description: PoH ensures that only verified humans can participate in online voting and governance, preventing Sybil attacks and fake identities from influencing decisions.

cards.title: Fair Airdrops
cards.description: PoH ensures fair airdrops by verifying real individuals and eliminating bots and duplicate claims.

cards.title: Certifications
cards.description: PoH guarantees the legitimacy of certifications by linking them to verified individuals, preventing fraud and credential forgery.

cards.title: Credit Scoring
cards.description: PoH enables equitable credit assessments by verifying real people, ensuring fairness, transparency, and inclusion in financial systems.

cards.title: Social Media
cards.description: PoH eliminates spam, bots, and trolls by ensuring only verified humans engage on social media, fostering a safer and more authentic online community.

discoverMoreText: Discover even more possibilities and explore how Proof of Humanity can enhance your project!
